name: Evil Genius Labs
body:
Plasma Lamp
===========
### Music reactive, remote-controlled RGB LED Lamp

Available by request, custom-made to order.
Please contact me at info[at]evilgeniuslabs.org or on Twitter [@evilgeniuslab](https://twitter.com/evilgeniuslab) for more information.

Patterns
--------
[![Plasma Lamp Patterns](http://img.youtube.com/vi/SNaRzPEzEGE/0.jpg)](http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=SNaRzPEzEGE)

Music Mode
----------
[![Plasma Lamp Music Mode](http://img.youtube.com/vi/YQbqccvnx4E/0.jpg)](http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=YQbqccvnx4E)
